original_title: Fofo or Would You Still Love Me
overview: In Veroia, a small town of the Greek countryside, Christos decides to interview his 87-year-old grandmother Fofo. Although he told her he only wishes to make a film about her and her life, Christos sees the interview as the perfect opportunity to ask his grandma about something he is afraid could endanger their close relationship.
title: Fofo or Would You Still Love Me
